name: Ozone Protector
description:
A DRAGIN DROP PRODUCTION

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE, IF THIS GAME SHOULD BE WORKED ON MORE, PLEASE COMMENT BELOW

WARNING: BRIGHT FLASHING COLORS

Use you mouse to move your shield, the grey smog enemies deplete your shield, so don't let them hit the shield. The bright sun enemies destroy your icecaps, so block them with your shield. Survive as long as possible

Please give feedback so we can make this better!

This was made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5 Free Edition

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com
